title: تحديث النظام
content:
Hello Dears,


Warm greetings from Product Team.

We extend our heartfelt wishes for a joyous Eid Mubarak to all of you !

We would like to inform you the latest updates regarding 2025 Hajj Season instructions. Kindly find the information below and take it into consideration while confirming your bookings for the upcoming period.

Please note that, anyone holding a tourist visit visa or any visit visa that is not a Hajj is not allowed to perform Hajj or enter the Holy City of Mecca or stay in it during the below period
From the 01st of the month of Dhul-Qi'dah, until the 14th of the month of Dhul- Hijjah (April 29 to June 11, 2025 AD)

The above instructions apply to all nationalities, including those who do not require a visa, as well as to Saudi citizens. Therefore, if we receive any updates, we will promptly get back to you and share the new information as soon as possible.





If you have any further assistance, please feel free to contact us.

Wishing you happy selling

Best Regards,
